name: Tabby
short_description: Beautiful and customizable browser start page with tab management.
description: Beautiful and customizable browser start page with tab management. Tabby is a self-hosted application focused on productivity, browsing, dashboard, utility. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Tabby on your home server to beautiful and customizable browser start page with tab management without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Tabby to manage your productivity workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
